content.question: Which of the following most directly led to the change in the “temper of America toward Great Britain” described in the excerpt?

choices.label: A change in the British constitution
The election of a new British Parliament
British efforts to consolidate control over its colonies
An end to American Indian threats requiring British protection

content.answer: British efforts to consolidate control over its colonies

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
